backend/main.mo: Defines game metadata and high score storage using maps, provides queries for available games and scores, and handles score submission logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old actor state to include new score maps for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files including game pages, routing, and shared components.
frontend/index.css: Defines base Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes for all game pages and leaderboard, wrapped in a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main page layout with header navigation, footer, and outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor, updating it when the user’s identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching games, high scores, player scores, and submitting new scores via the backend actor. Automatically handles caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and global design tokens, including color variables, dark mode overrides, and utility classes. Applies base typography and pixel-font styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AsteroidsGame.tsx: Implements a playable Asteroids game with ship movement, bullets, asteroids, scoring, and life tracking. Supports pausing, resetting, and submitting scores.
frontend/src/pages/BreakoutGame.tsx: Implements a Breakout-style game with paddle control, ball physics, bricks, scoring, and lives. Includes pause/reset controls and score submission.
frontend/src/pages/DonkeyKongGame.tsx: Implements a Donkey Kong–inspired platformer with jumping, ladders, falling barrels, scoring, levels, and lives. Allows pausing, resetting, and submitting scores.
frontend/src/pages/FroggerGame.tsx: Implements a Frogger clone with canvas rendering, obstacle generation, collision handling, scoring, and a score‑submission dialog.
frontend/src/pages/GalagaGame.tsx: Implements a Galaga-style shooter with waves of aliens, player and alien bullets, movement logic, scoring, and game state management.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a grid of available games with images and navigation links, using data from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows leaderboards for all games with tabs, score tables, and navigation, loading data from high-score queries.
frontend/src/pages/MinesweeperGame.tsx: Implements a Minesweeper game including grid generation, mine placement, reveal logic, timer, and score submission dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PacManGame.tsx: Implements a Pac‑Man clone with grid movement, ghost AI, scoring, lives, and score submission UI.
frontend/src/pages/PongGame.tsx: Implements a single‑player Pong game with paddle controls, AI opponent, ball physics, scoring, and score submission.
frontend/src/pages/RollingBallsGame.tsx: Implements a physics‑based rolling ball platformer with moving platforms, checkpoints, scoring, and pause/submit UI.
frontend/src/pages/SnakeGame.tsx: Implements a classic Snake game with grid movement, collision detection, food generation, scoring, and score submission.
frontend/src/pages/SpaceInvadersGame.tsx: Implements a Space Invaders clone with player movement, aliens, bullets, collision logic, scoring, and score submission.
frontend/src/pages/TetrisGame.tsx: Implements a full React-based Tetris game with rendering, piece logic, scoring, pause/game over handling, and score submission.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, requirements, and pending requests for adding classic games and backend support.
